publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3528.1 John Scott: Marine Bill Consultationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-3528) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "and considers that the forthcoming marine legislation must fully take into account the interests of commercial fisheries and recreational sea anglers and could provide an appropriate vehicle for tackling the severe decline in breeding sea bird populations."
